kun reading compounds: 香【か】smell (esp. a good smell), fragrance, scent, aroma, perfume
香り【かおり】aroma, fragrance, scent, smell
腸香【わたか】wataka (Ischikauia steenackeri) (freshwater fish of the carp family)
木の香【きのか】smell of new wood
香り【かおり】aroma, fragrance, scent, smell
香りがする【かおりがする】to smell, to smell of, to have a smell
香る【かおる】to smell sweet, to be fragrant
